title: #197: The Keepers: Unfinished Business
description:
Laura Richards, Jim Clemente and Lisa Zambetti revisit the murder of Sister Cathy Cesnik in Baltimore in 1969 which was featured in the documentary "The Keepers" with Gemma Hoskins and Shane Waters, Gemma's co-host of the 'Out of the Shadows' podcast. We discuss what has happened since The Keepers and other potentially linked offences

#HerNameWasCathyCesnik

#HerNameWasJoyceMalecki
